mapper.select: select count(1) from ( SELECT a.STUDENT_ID, d.STUDENT_NAME, a.LEARN_NUMBER, a.NETWORK_SCHOOL_CODE, e.SCHOOL_CHINESE_NAME, a.LEARNCENTER_ID, f.LEARNCENTER_NAME, d.UNIT_CODE, j.CUSTOMER_NAME, a.EDUCATION_PRODUCT_ID, g.PRODUCT_NAME, a.PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE, l.CODE_NAME as PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME, a.GRADE_ID, k.GRADE_NAME, b.TERM_ID, h.TERM_NAME, b.CLASS_ID, i.CLASS_NAME, c.ACT_COUNT, c.MUST_COUNT, c.MY_ACTCOUNT, c.MY_MUSTACTCOUNT, c.MY_COURSE_PROGRESS, a.CREATED_DT, j.ACTIVATE_DT, FROM DW_STUDENT_STATUS_INFO a LEFT JOIN DW_STUDENT_CHOOSE b ON b.SCHOOL_ROLL_ID = a.SCHOOL_ROLL_ID LEFT JOIN DW_USER_DYNA c ON c.CHOOSE_ID = b.STUDENT_CHOOSE_ID INNER JOIN DW_STUDENT_INFO d ON d.STUDENT_ID = a.STUDENT_ID LEFT JOIN DW_NETWORK_SCHOOL_INFO e ON e.NETWORK_SCHOOL_CODE = A.NETWORK_SCHOOL_CODE LEFT JOIN DW_LEARNCENTER_INFO f ON f.LEARNCENTER_ID = a.LEARNCENTER_ID INNER JOIN DW_EDUCATION_PRODCUT_INFO g ON g.EDUCATION_PRODUCT_ID = a.EDUCATION_PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN DW_TERM_INFO h ON h.TERM_ID = b.TERM_ID LEFT JOIN DW_CLASS_INFO i ON i.CLASS_ID = b.CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN DW_CUSTOMER_INFO j ON j.CUSTOMER_CODE = d.UNIT_CODE LEFT JOIN DW_GRADE_INFO k ON k.GRADE_ID = a.GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN DW_SYS_DATA l on l.CODE_VALUE = a.PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE and l.DICT_TYPE_CODE = 'PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE' ) TB WHERE 1=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.STUDENT_ID, d.STUDENT_NAME, a.LEARN_NUMBER, a.NETWORK_SCHOOL_CODE, e.SCHOOL_CHINESE_NAME, a.LEARNCENTER_ID, f.LEARNCENTER_NAME, d.UNIT_CODE, j.CUSTOMER_NAME, a.EDUCATION_PRODUCT_ID, g.PRODUCT_NAME, a.PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE, l.CODE_NAME as PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME, a.GRADE_ID, k.GRADE_NAME, b.TERM_ID, h.TERM_NAME, b.CLASS_ID, i.CLASS_NAME, c.ACT_COUNT, c.MUST_COUNT, c.MY_ACTCOUNT, c.MY_MUSTACTCOUNT, c.MY_COURSE_PROGRESS, a.CREATED_DT, j.ACTIVATE_DT FROM DW_STUDENT_STATUS_INFO a LEFT JOIN DW_STUDENT_CHOOSE b ON b.SCHOOL_ROLL_ID = a.SCHOOL_ROLL_ID LEFT JOIN DW_USER_DYNA c ON c.CHOOSE_ID = b.STUDENT_CHOOSE_ID INNER JOIN DW_STUDENT_INFO d ON d.STUDENT_ID = a.STUDENT_ID LEFT JOIN DW_NETWORK_SCHOOL_INFO e ON e.NETWORK_SCHOOL_CODE = A.NETWORK_SCHOOL_CODE LEFT JOIN DW_LEARNCENTER_INFO f ON f.LEARNCENTER_ID = a.LEARNCENTER_ID INNER JOIN DW_EDUCATION_PRODCUT_INFO g ON g.EDUCATION_PRODUCT_ID = a.EDUCATION_PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN DW_TERM_INFO h ON h.TERM_ID = b.TERM_ID LEFT JOIN DW_CLASS_INFO i ON i.CLASS_ID = b.CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN DW_CUSTOMER_INFO j ON j.CUSTOMER_CODE = d.UNIT_CODE LEFT JOIN DW_GRADE_INFO k ON k.GRADE_ID = a.GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN DW_SYS_DATA l on l.CODE_VALUE = a.PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE and l.DICT_TYPE_CODE = 'PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE' ) TB WHERE 1=1
